About me

Welcome! Let me tell you a few things...

Biography

I´m an Electronics Engineer with more than 16 years of working experience that has decided to reinforce his professional knowledge with toolkits from the stunning worlds of Data Science and Web Development.

I´ve created this website as a showcase for some data science, web development and general programming related posts that I´ve started to publish. Hope you find them interesting!
